memberdef.argsstring: (T P0x, T P0y, T P1x, T P1y, T P2x, T P2y)
memberdef.name: isLeft

briefdescription.para: Tests if a point is Left|On|Right of an infinite line.

detaileddescription.para: Returns >0 for P2 left of the line through P0 and P1, =0 for P2 on the line, <0 for P2 right of the line. See: Algorithm 1 "Area of Triangles and Polygons"

memberdef.argsstring: (T Px, T Py, F *Vx, F *Vy, int n)
memberdef.name: cn_PnPoly

briefdescription.para: Crossing number test for a point in a polygon.

detaileddescription.para: Determines if a point is inside a polygon using the crossing number algorithm. cn_PnPoly(): crossing number test for a point in a polygon Input: P = a point, V[] = vertex points of a polygon V[n+1] with V[n]=V[0] Return: 0 = outside, 1 = inside

memberdef.argsstring: (T Px, T Py, T *Vx, T *Vy, unsigned int n)
memberdef.name: wn_PnPoly

briefdescription.para: winding number test for a point in a polygon

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: wn_PnPoly(): winding number test for a point in a polygon Input: P = a point, V[] = vertex points of a polygon V[n+1] with V[n]=V[0] Return: wn = the winding number (=0 only when P is outside)

briefdescription.para: check polygon handedness and reverse if necessary.

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: check polygon handedness and enforce left-handesness (Counter-clockwise). This function is used to ensure the right polygon handedness for the winding number inpoly (using the isleft())

detaileddescription.para: Returns the sum of two Vertex objects.
Returns the difference of two Vertex objects.

briefdescription.para: Compute dot product of two vertices.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the dot product of two Vertex objects.

briefdescription.para: Compute cross product of two vertices.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the cross product of two Vertex objects.
Checks whether two polygon segments intersect. Polygon P and Q are only 2 vertex long each. i.e. they represent a segment each.

simplesect.para: True if segments intersect, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Checks whether two polygons intersect by testing all segment pairs. The function checks whether each segment of Polygon P intersect any segment of Poly Q. If an intersection is detected, returns true immediately.

simplesect.para: True if polygons intersect, false otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (T xo, T yo, T dx, int blkwidth, Polygon Poly)
memberdef.name: blockinpoly

briefdescription.para: Check whether a block is inside or intersects a polygon.

detaileddescription.para: Determines if any corner of the block is inside the polygon or if the block intersects the polygon.

simplesect.para: True if block is inside or intersects polygon, false otherwise

memberdef.argsstring: (float xo, float yo, float dx, int blkwidth, Polygon Poly)
memberdef.name: blockinpoly< float >

memberdef.argsstring: (double xo, double yo, double dx, int blkwidth, Polygon Poly)
memberdef.name: blockinpoly< double >

detaileddescription.para:
Tests the winding number function for a block polygon.
True if test passes, false otherwise

Tests the segment intersection function for known cases.
True if test passes, false otherwise

Tests the polygon intersection function for known cases.
True if test passes, false otherwise
